Tournaments -- Lifespan Loss?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Research on game mechanics: Tournaments -- Lifespan Loss?
By Harrabcat on Thursday, February 5, 2004 - 08:00 pm:

Ok Testing Tournaments Using T6 Pixie heres what I did.

Used the T6 pixie (ignored the rest) Same variables as in lifespan experiment except T6 went on a few tournaments. I tried to get ko'd during the tournaments but not so much luck there. heres the timeline

8/1T6 Participated in tournament
8/4T6 Participated in tournament
9/1T6 Participated in tournament and got KO'd Once
9/3T6 Participated in tournament and got KO'd Once
10/1T6 Died

As you can see no lifespan loss from participating in 4 tournaments and getting KO'd twice.

Any questions comments or the likewise?

By GoGators! on Sunday, February 8, 2004 - 05:34 pm:
